medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe abdominal pain and hypotension after lifting an air conditioner.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced sudden onset of severe abdominal pain, weakness, and diaphoresis while lifting an air conditioner, with the pain rated as 10/10. Symptoms progressed within approximately 60 minutes, leading to hypotension and severe distress upon arrival at the hospital.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of alcohol abuse, previous admission for epigastric pain and nausea about 3 months prior, left inguinal herniorrhaphy, and surgical repair of a fracture of the right humeral head.
medical_history.family_history: Parents died in their 60s from myocardial infarctions.
medical_history.social_history: Lives alone, receiving disability compensation due to shoulder injury, does not smoke or use illicit drugs, and had been drinking excessively in the 2 days prior to this admission.
